reviewText: I saw this in my I Love Lucy in the 2015 edition... This was one of the bonus feature in season 7-9, there is no need to pay for this over price for 1 episode that is less than 60 minutes. I believe amazon right now is selling it for $37.99 I Love Lucy: The Complete Series.

Overall good DVD. The reason its getting 4 stars instead of 5 stars is because. I watched the entire special on YouTube. And then found when I got the DVD. That some of the original backround scenery was not showing. I also think they might have switched some parts around from the original film. But it is still a wonderful piece of history to view again and again!!

Goodtimes has a lot of nerve charging 40 bucks for this low quality print.  For about 13 dollars LESS, you can get a better quality print of this PLUS all thirteen episodes of the Lucy-Desi Comedy Hour PLUS other bonus materials.  Yes, the "I Love Lucy: The Complete Seasons 7-9" DVD, which is currently available on Amazon for $27 includes this Lucy-Desi Westinghouse special as a bonus feature, and in perfect condition AND without the Goodtimes logo appearing on the screen.
